svt_i2c_write_7b_10b_mode_pattern_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_write_7b_10b_mode_pattern_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class represents a pattern sequence, which needs to scanned for Write command (7 bit addressing) followed by Write command (10bit addressing) .
Sequence is used to recognize following sequence in transactions :

  • Write(7 bit addressing) -> Write(10 bit addressing)
